localize.full_text:
尼科拉又是一个井喷的季度：营收0美元，净亏损1.47亿美元。流通股继续上涨（同比+44%）。市值：80亿美元。

$NKLA

https://t.co/vwIBl39DFD

$NKLA

PsychoMarket Recap - Thursday, February 25, 2021

Stocks plummeted Thursday as a spike in Treasury yields spooked equity
investors. The S&P 500 (SPY) and the Dow Jones (DIA) fell by 2.4% and 1.73%
respectively. The tech-heavy Nasdaq fell by 3.5%, recording its worst day since
October 2020. In other…
